channel.title: Islands #319
channel.description:
Hey there. Just a quick development topic for now as I am on my phone. Will add a lot more depth and detail when I get access to my laptop.
[img]http://islands-rsps.org/public/style_images/4_islogo1.png[/img]
[b]Developers [/b] BigShot (website and graphics developer) Scully (server developer) Mendorphins (server developer)
[b]About[/b] The server is based off of lare69's Asteria 2.0. It is a 319 revision server which we believe is right up to the recruitment drive quest. Items are up to initiate plate legs. There server has slayer but no farming so it still retains that old school vibe but with a wider variety of items such as barrows and slayer items/weapons.
The game is based off of a server from a few years ago by Runite of rune-server.org. We will mainly be making use of of all the islands the map has to offer, along with a few ports and hidden dungeons and caves. Above all we want to create a professional and fun community for everyone to enjoy.
The project is barebones including combat. Scully and I will be writing the skills and game content whilst our very talented web dev and graphics artist BigShot will be taking care of an asthetically please forums and website for you all to enjoy.
More information to come.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/87d805767bc1612664a4c0011533982c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/56c73565d9c11faececb11e8b6157641.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/10ee707bfa15ed8817294e4ac67ed20c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/95e63fe95ea13b91a5721ee5b18eef61.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e7303ef67f990a173325761f63c8cf25.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2OIpq6d.png[/img]

item.title: Islands #319
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Smallish update while I finish work on finishing up the work week.

Books! We’re going to add a collection of books to Islands as we go, but this beginner’s guide is to introduce players to the means of transportation within the game and just outlining what an economy server is.


Some Crafting stuff! I still have to finish up adding dragon leather, but that will come soon enough.



Read full topic

item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Hey there. Just a quick development topic for now as I am on my phone. Will add a lot more depth and detail when I get access to my laptop.

Developers
BigShot (website and graphics developer)
Scully (server developer)
Mendorphins (server developer)

About
The server is based off of lare69’s Asteria 2.0. It is a 319 revision server which we believe is right up to the recruitment drive quest. Items are up to initiate plate legs. There server has slayer but no farming so it still retains that old school vibe but with a wider variety of items such as barrows and slayer items/weapons.

The game is based off of a server from a few years ago by Runite of rune-server.org. We will mainly be making use of of all the islands the map has to offer, along with a few ports and hidden dungeons and caves. Above all we want to create a professional and fun community for everyone to enjoy.

The project is barebones including combat. Scully and I will be writing the skills and game content whilst our very talented web dev and graphics artist BigShot will be taking care of an asthetically please forums and website for you all to enjoy.

More information to come.
